description:
KnowledgeWoods PMP® Exam Prep Overview Course has been conceptualized to provide a simple, easy to understand Road Map to PMP® Aspirants worldwide and help them become PMP® Certified within 45 Days.

Create a Plan to pass PMP® Certification Exam at the very first attempt with the help of:

  • Road Map to Pass PMP® within 45 days.
  • In depth knowledge of the Exam Essentials of all Knowledge Areas.
  • A consolidated & downloadable document of all the Inputs, Tools & Techniques, and Outputs.
  • In depth knowledge of the Goals of all the Knowledge Areas.

A Simple & Free Course to give you a High Level View of the PMP® Exam
Learning the goals, exam essentials of PMP® Certification Exam alongwith the consolidated form of all the Inputs, Tools & Techniques, and Outputs helps a participant to have a strong hold on the subject of Project Management.

Content and Overview

Suitable for PMP® Aspirants, through this course of 26 lectures and 31 minutes of content, you’ll learn all of the PMP® Exam Essentials and establish a strong understanding of Inputs, Tools & Techniques, and Outputs which is the core of PMP® Certification Exam.

With these information in hand a PMP® Aspirant will be in a strong position and have a clear scope as to what will be required to Pass the PMP® Exam in the very first attempt and within 45 days.

Students completing the course will have a 45 days Plan to Pass the PMP® Exam in the very first attempt and within 45 days.

Also students get a downloadable and consolidated document of all the Inputs, Tools & Techniques, and Outputs which is the core of PMP® Certification Exam.

For any additional information/query, please feel free to get in touch with us.
title: PMP® Exam Prep Overview
